Given that the provision of this service can only be carried out at the sports facility called the Municipal Swimming Pool Complex and that this is municipally owned, In this case, hiring will be carried out in this space if there is no other space with these characteristics. Summary: Comprehensive Service of Exterior Lighting (Including Energy Consumption), Renovation and Maintenance (Not Including the Cost of the Energy Consumed by these Installations) of Interior Lighting And.... Description: Comprehensive service of exterior lighting (including energy consumption), renovation and maintenance (not including the cost of the energy consumed by these installations) of interior lighting and... The purpose of this contract is the comprehensive management and intelligent exterior public lighting, renovation and maintenance of interior lighting and electrical and thermal installations of municipal buildings and offices and ornamental fountains in the city of Huelva, and serve as an operational tool for the pursuit of the objectives of energy efficiency, operational improvement, digitalization and innovation marked by municipal strategies (Urban Agenda, Municipal Plan against Climate Change and Innovation Master Plan, through the objective of carbon neutrality). The ultimate goal of the contract is to structure the actions to implement the development of energy strategies framed in the Innovation Master Plan of the Huelva City Council 2024-2027. Based on this plan, the Huelva City Council is committed to innovation as an essential factor to accelerate its urban development under the triple logic of economic, social and environmental sustainability. Furthermore, it aims to adopt an exemplary leadership role in the field of innovation, seeking a notable evolution in the way of providing public services. Description: According to Directive 2000/60/EC on the monitoring of the state of surface water, groundwater and protected areas, member states will ensure the establishment of monitoring programs for the state of water bodies in order to obtain a general and coherent overview and complete in each hydrographic district.<br> The consolidated text of the Water Law, approved by Royal Legislative Decree 1/2001, of July 20, establishes that in the case of surface water masses, a flow regime will be established as a prior restriction on exploitation systems. ecological.<br> And the evaluation of said regime has been carried out with each annual monitoring of the Hydrological Plan.<br> Notwithstanding the above, on July 18, 2023 A modification of the Regulation of the Hydraulic Public Domain is promulgated (Royal Decree 9/2008), establishing new obligations regarding the monitoring and evaluation of said ecological flow regime, in its articles 49. quinquies and sexies, stipulating that the hydraulic administrations and basin organizations will develop specific programs to monitor their implementation, which will allow them to analyze both their compliance and their effects on the river environment and the aquatic and riparian ecosystems it supports, and especially in protected areas. input: Country: Spain. Purchaser Name: GOVERNING BOARD OF THE ALMERIA CITY COUNCIL. Summary: Contract for the Public Street and Beach Cleaning Service in the Municipality of Almeria. Description: The object of this contract is the public street and beach cleaning service in the municipality of Almeria.<br> This service includes cleaning waste abandoned in public spaces including beaches, cleaning stains, graffiti, emptying, washing and maintenance. of litter bins, removal of unwanted weeds and bushes, as well as transporting the collected waste to specific treatment facilities.<br> Law 7/1985, of April 2, on the Bases of the Local Regime, in its article 25.1, attributes to the municipalities the promotion of all kinds of activities and provision of any public services that contribute to satisfying the needs and aspirations of the neighborhood community, pointing out, among others, in article 26, the powers regarding environmental protection and street cleaning.<br> The characteristics of the benefits object of the contract are as follows:<br> • Sweeping of public roads.<br> • Washing of public roads.<br> • Scrubbing public roads.<br> • Cleaning of open and closed tree pits and planters.<br> • Cleaning of leisure and recreation areas.<br> • Cleaning of graffiti and removal of posters.<br> • Cleaning of excrement animals.<br> • Scheduled spot cleaning.<br> • Intensive cleaning of pavements.<br> • Cleaning during leaf, flower and fruit fall season.<br> • Cleaning of municipal lots, boulevards and ravines<br> • Cleaning of industrial areas.<br> • Cleaning of events or f.... Published Date: 2025-11-21. Closing Date: 2025-12-29. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Spain. Purchaser Name: SANT GUIM DE FREIXENET COUNCIL. Summary: Installation of Remote Voting in the Municipality of Sant Guim De Freixenet, by Simplified Open Procedure. Description: Description of the provision: That the municipality of Sant Guim de Freixenet makes more efficient use of water, improves the management of the supply and achieves levels of savings that are evaluable, since it is essential to have information complete and of high quality in terms of actual consumption. In this sense, the reading systems and the quality of meter measurements are essential elements of any demand management policy. The project of this action proposes the renewal of 625 meters and their integration into a remote reading system using a fixed network, which will allow data collection to be automated and available in real time, improving the city council's ability to diagnose and act.. Published Date: 2025-11-18. Closing Date: 2025-11-28. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: SANT GUIM DE FREIXENET COUNCIL
output.Summary: Installation of Remote Voting in the Municipality of Sant Guim De Freixenet, by Simplified Open Procedure
output.Description: Description of the provision: That the municipality of Sant Guim de Freixenet makes more efficient use of water, improves the management of the supply and achieves levels of savings that are evaluable, since it is essential to have information complete and of high quality in terms of actual consumption. In this sense, the reading systems and the quality of meter measurements are essential elements of any demand management policy. The project of this action proposes the renewal of 625 meters and their integration into a remote reading system using a fixed network, which will allow data collection to be automated and available in real time, improving the city council's ability to diagnose and act.
